column4: how do i find out what sound module my kernel has loaded for my sound card?
try  lshw -class sound  and/or  lsmod | grep snd

how do i get the name i use in the alsa config? is there an easier way to get it (i'm trying to make a guide to help with a problem) like "snd-via82xx" directly after a command (with the current sound card)
